name: VR Army Truck Driver: Real Mountain Snow Drive
name_original: VR Army Truck Driver: Real Mountain Snow Drive
description:
The army base is under enemy attack and supply line has been cut off. To provide the support & help to our fellow soldiers and troops an experience and brave army drive has to step up for his country and fellow soldiers in this dire straits situation in VR Army Truck Driver: Real Mountain Snow Drive. The team is waiting and enemy is on attach, you have to show your truck driving and battle field training in this desperate situation and in extreme weather conditions.
In this VR Army Truck Driver: Real Mountain Snow Drive your mission is to show your army heavy vehicle handling skills in middle of the war. You have transport the infantry, weapons, food, supplies, armors, missile from headquarters to different bases under attached and looking for re-enforcements. These are very critical to beat the enemy plans and attacks at all cost. You must transport the required supplies and on time!
This will be test of courage and skill in VR Army Truck Driver: Real Mountain Snow where failure is no option. We are looking towards you for this impossible and challenging mission and you must deliver as per your past reputation. This is not for the ordinary soldier but for the men ready to take the challenge and look in to the danger for their country and fellow men! The men of honor!

Game Features:
1) Challenging Army Truck Driving levels
2) Easy game control
3) Amazing VR Gameplay experience
